type.name: org.gradle.api.execution.TaskActionListener
type.description:
*

A {@code TaskWorkListener} is notified of the actions that a task performs.

method.name: afterActions
method.description: * This method is called immediately after the task has completed performing its actions. * * @param task The task which has performed some actions.

method.name: beforeActions
method.description: * This method is called immediately before the task starts performing its actions. * * @param task The task which is to perform some actions.
